extensionDescription.message: Open link to passing URL as a parameter to some other site

options_js_errorEmptyInput.message: Title or URL can't be empty

options_js_urlHelpTooltip.message:
%u is replaced by the URL of the link you click. If %u doesn't appear in the input text, link's URL is appended to the input text.
If the URL contains a literal %u, which should not be replaced, write %25u instead.
